title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 5-Star Customer Service: Duolingo's Path to Compute Savings (CMP349)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 五星级客户服务：Duolingo的计算成本节约之路 (CMP349)
abstract: Amazon was founded over offering customers low prices across our wide selection of services. When Duolingo looked to optimize their cloud investments, they experienced this firsthand through their Technical Account Manager (TAM). In this session, Duolingo tech leadership and their TAM will share their journey: from the TAM’s approach to identifying cost savings to Duolingo’s experience implementing AWS Graviton processors. You’ll hear how the methodology—from cost analysis and proof of concept, through enterprise-wide implementation—led to significant savings. Together, they’ll demonstrate how the TAM’s focus on customer success exemplifies AWS’s commitment to 5-star service, resulting in business value for Duolingo.
abstract_cn: 亚马逊的创立初衷是为客户提供广泛服务选择中的低价格。当Duolingo寻求优化其云投资时，他们通过技术客户经理(TAM)亲身体验了这一点。在本次会议中，Duolingo技术领导团队和他们的TAM将分享他们的历程：从TAM识别成本节约的方法到Duolingo实施AWS Graviton处理器的经验。您将了解从成本分析和概念验证到企业级实施的整个方法论如何带来显著的成本节约。他们将共同展示TAM对客户成功的关注如何体现AWS对5星级服务的承诺，从而为Duolingo创造业务价值。

presenter.name: Seth Fox
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture Amazon EC2
